title: Who has access to the greatest number of atoms? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all atoms are the simplest uncharged particles that make up elements which in turn make all matter around me and you and everyone else. If you look at your phone or your laptop that contains more atoms than there are stars in the universe. let me add the fact that I am not able to understand your question but I hope that now you atleast know amazing atom facts.
